summary: Set in 1952, as England prepares for the coronation, this movie tells the story of two very different men who have one thing in common - a face.
cast: Matthew Rhys|Eileen Atkins|Anton Lesser|Jodhi May|Phoebe Nicholls|Alice Orr-Ewing|Andrew Scott|Sheridan Smith|Sylvie Testud|Pip Torrens|Ian Mercer|Eloise Webb|Julian Wadham|Richard Ridings|Roland Oliver|Ben Lloyd-Hughes|Greg Bennett|Martin Poole|Lucy Scarfe
keywords: literature on screen|european literature on screen|british literature on screen|20th century literature on screen|england
title: Doble vida
